'Oscar Egg' (2 March 1890 in Schlatt, Switzerland - 9 February 1961 in Nice,
France) was a Swiss track and road bicycle racer. He captured the world hour
record three times before the First World War. He also won major road races and
stages of the Tour de France and Giro d'Italia.
categories: Swiss Tour de France stage winners
People from the canton of Zurich
